title: Road To Heaven
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Been a long time
Since I've seen your face
You've been on my mind
Like a dream I can't erase
It's time for me to come home to you
[Chorus]
I'm on the road to heaven [x2]
Coming home to you
[Verse 2]
Been a long time
Since last time we made love
All the things we used to do baby
All the things that made me fall in love
[Chorus]
I'm on the road to heaven [x4]
Coming home to you [x2]
[Instrumental Break]
I'm on the road to heaven [x4]
Coming home to you [x2]

[Outro]
I'm coming home [x8]
Coming home to you
Coming home to you, baby
Too long I've been walking around wondering
But I'm coming home to you
